parameters.description: Number of edges and setback distances for this vertex

parameters.name: Vtx
parameters.description: Vertex for which to get setback distance

parameters.name: EdgeArr

title: ISimpleFilletFeatureData2.IGetSetbackVertexDistance
description: Gets the setback distance for the specified vertex on this simple fillet feature.
signature:
System.Double IGetSetbackVertexDistance( 
   System.Int32
Count
,
   Vertex
Vtx
,
   out Edge
EdgeArr
)

parameters.name: Count
parameters.description: Number of edges and setback distances for this vertex

parameters.name: Vtx
parameters.description: Vertex for which to get setback distance

parameters.name: EdgeArr
parameters.description: in-process, unmanaged C++: Pointer to an array of edges at the specified vertex (see Remarks ) VBA, VB.NET, C#, and C++/CLI: Not supported See In-process Methods for details about this type of method.

returns: in-process, unmanaged C++: Pointer to an array of setback distances at the specified vertex VBA, VB.NET, C#, and C++/CLI: Not supported See In-process Methods for details about this type of method.
remarks:
There is a one-to-one correspondence between the edge array and the setback distance array.
Before calling this method, call
ISimpleFilletFeatureData2::GetSetbackDistanceCount
to get the number of edges and setback distances at the specified vertex.
